title: Two bombings in two capitals put nuclear-armed neighbors on edge
description: Rare back-to-back bombings in the capitals of two nuclear-armed neighbors are threatening to send India and Pakistan to the brink of conflict for the second time this year, as tensions also soar between Pakistan and Afghanistan
